text: Deborah Snyder (n√©e Johnson) is an American producer of movies and television commercials. She is married to moviemaker Zack Snyder. She has often worked with him on movies such as Watchmen and 300. She is the co-founder of the production company Cruel and Unusual Films. ==Personal life== Snyder is currently married to moviemaker Zack Snyder. They met in 1996. They married on September 25, 2004. The wedding was at St. Bartholomew's Episcopal Church in Manhattan, New York. They currently live in Pasadena, California. ==Movies== Year Movie Role 2007 300 Executive producer 2009 Watchmen Movie producer 2010 Legend of the Guardians: The Owls of Ga'Hoole Executive producer 2011 Sucker Punch Movie producer 2013 Man of Steel Movie producer 2016 Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice Movie producer 2017 Justice League Part One Movie producer 2021 Zack Snyder's Justice League Movie producer ==References== ==Other websites== * * Cruel and Unusual Films official website Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Movie producers from New Jersey
title: Deborah Snyder
